duties_responsibilities.duty: Meet or exceed district quotas for loan and lease volumes
Meet or exceed district Dealer Penetration goals
Manage district through analysis of potential dealer and customer opportunities
Develop actionable and measurable territory plans
Collaborate with Volvo and Mack Truck representatives to ensure support
Support OEMs on conquest and targeted customers

education_certification.credential: BA/BS degree in Finance, Marketing or closely related (Master’s degree a plus)
